Question: Fujian Yesoul Health Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Yesoul Health Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- S3-PRO
  - Screen size: 10.1inch
  - Software support: Android
  - Kind of drive: belt drive
  - Power: 12v power adapter
  - Height limitation: 150-195cm
  - Rated max. loaded: 120kgs (264.55lbs)
  - Net weight: 32kgs
  - Gross weight: 37kgs
  - Flywheel weight: 7.5kgs
  - Floor space: 1010*510*1165mm
  - Certificate: CE

- V1 Plus
  - Screen size: 21.5inch smart touch screen
  - Kind of drive: belt drive
  - Handlebar: plastic-impregnated steel pipe
  - Resistance bar material: aluminum alloy
  - Frame material: high strength alloy steel
  - Power adapter: 12V 3A
  - Rated max. loaded: 150kgs (330.69lbs)
  - Net weight: 60kgs
  - Gross weight: 70kgs
  - Flywheel weight: 10kgs
  - Floor space: 145*53*130cm
  - Dumbbell: 1kgx2pcs
Summary_cn:

  - 把手：塑料预浸钢管
